Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28661457] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=45.54 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=91.08 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa clinical isolate (MIC=91.08 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=22.77 μM), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=182.16 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28661457] 10.27 ± 0.42% hemolysis at 500 μg/mL against murine red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28661457] The cell viability of HEK293 at the peptide concentration of 250 μg/ml is 88.18±9.48%. IC50 > 1000 μg/ml against HEK293 cells.

Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity of AI-Hemocidin 2, a Novel N-Terminal Peptide of Hemoglobin Purified from Arca inflata
Literature.Author: Li C, Zhu J, Wang Y, Chen Y, Song L, Zheng W, Li J, Yu R.
